name: Love Shots
description:
Please, can you find a direction for the blue ball to its love?

Touch the screen and rotate the aim line to shot, the blue ball will bounce against the wall and meet its beloved red ball with a right angle.

Sure you can solve the puzzles and finally let the two lovely balls meet again!

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week
